p: Anti-vector immunity was determined via ELISA as described above. Coat protein was empty AAV8 particles at 2 x 10 10 gc/ml in PBS. Serum samples were serially diluted 5-fold over 8 dilutions and applied to plates following coating and blocking. Anti-Rhesus IgG (Southern Biotech; clone SB108a) was used for detection. Plates were resolved and readings acquired as above.
